item.description:
Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is sent on a three-year one-man mission to the moon to mine Helium-3, which has become Earthâ€™s primary source of energy in the future. As his stint there is winding up, a freak accident and its ensuing events threaten to change everything. Directed by Duncan Jones' (David Bowie's son)

item.name: Moon
